name: stylishness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a high quality in appearance, design, or behaviour: There was a plain but attractive stylishness about her appearance. The hotel has the cool, modern stylishness of Italian interior design. See
stylish
More examplesFewer examplesHats have an eternal stylishness.The brand encapsulates the innate stylishness of France. The effortless naturalism of the performers only reinforces the film's matter-of-fact stylishness.
